    opennlp.tools.cmdline.postag  
    opennlp.tools.postag
    Package related to part-of-speech tagging.

      class  POSEvaluationErrorListener
      A default implementation of EvaluationMonitor that prints to an output stream.

      Generates a detailed report for the POS Tagger.

      POSTaggerCrossValidator(String languageCode, TrainingParameters trainParam, POSDictionary tagDictionary, Dictionary ngramDictionary, POSTaggerEvaluationMonitor... listeners)
      Deprecated. 
      use POSTaggerCrossValidator.POSTaggerCrossValidator(String, TrainingParameters, POSTaggerFactory, POSTaggerEvaluationMonitor...) instead and pass in a POSTaggerFactory.

      Deprecated. 
      use POSTaggerCrossValidator.POSTaggerCrossValidator(String, TrainingParameters, POSTaggerFactory, POSTaggerEvaluationMonitor...) instead and pass in the name of POSTaggerFactory sub-class.

      Deprecated. 
      use POSTaggerCrossValidator.POSTaggerCrossValidator(String, TrainingParameters, POSTaggerFactory, POSTaggerEvaluationMonitor...) instead and pass in a POSTaggerFactory.
      POSTaggerCrossValidator(String languageCode, TrainingParameters trainParam, POSTaggerFactory factory, POSTaggerEvaluationMonitor... listeners)
      Creates a POSTaggerCrossValidator using the given POSTaggerFactory.
